Entry.Content:
From this demo:

http://www.msteched.com/2010/NewZealand/WEB203

Here are the CMS’s talked about:

http://n2cms.com/ – ASP.NET MVC.  Very lightweight CMS

not bad source code to read..

demo here

 

Kentico (large project type size)  4000 websites worldwide.  USD$2k

markerstudio –they use mostly kentico

maps.yellow.co.nz

asp.net, SQL Server

Umbraco – open source..91,000 installs.. has  a pro version too. going MVC in v5

Peter Gregory – Official Umbrabo trainer, and core team member

Web Forms, .NET3.5/4

microsoft asp.net, wired.co.uk, gc, vouge, christchurchnz.com

user controls, eventing model

 

Wordpress

DotNetNuke

Community Server
